charaepi_ch0206_00_lajournee/2301_1101_0:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came to a certain
place after [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] could battle against a
strong sync pair there...
charaepi_ch0206_00_lajournee/2301_1201_0: Hey, Nita! What’s with that battle?!

You should have the dignity o’ the Battle Maison
by now!

I don’t see why I need to care about that sort
of thing!
charaepi_ch0206_00_lajournee/2301_0301_0: Could I challenge you to a battle?
charaepi_ch0206_00_lajournee/2301_1201_1: Welcome, challenger! My name is Dana—

So ye may already know since ye came for
a battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...

but we’ve been trainin’ here against Pasio’s
sync pairs.

I’ll show ye the tactics we gained from me
experience with Triple Battles!
charaepi_ch0206_00_lajournee/2301_0401_1: Huh? Ye haven’t heard of Triple Battles?
charaepi_ch0206_00_lajournee/2301_0402_2:
Are ye telling me...ye haven’t heard of Triple
Battles?
charaepi_ch0206_00_lajournee/2301_1201_2:
A Triple Battle is a battle format where ye battle
with three Pokémon!

There are other battle formats in the Battle Maison,
and each of us have formats we’re in charge of.
I, Dana, am an expert at Triple Battles!

So out of the sisters, I’m the most compatible with
Pasio’s team battles!

But all the Trainers on Pasio are strong and work
well together, so my recent battles have been
close.

I can’t believe I’m not the best at
three-on-three battles!
charaepi_ch0206_00_lajournee/2301_1201_3:
I know, Regice... I need to keep a cool head, even
if my heart’s burnin’.

Smart one, isn’t it? When I get too heated up, it
stops me.

If I’m not calm in front of the customers, I’ll be told
off by me sister...
When Dana gets too excited, she forgets to act!
charaepi_ch0206_00_lajournee/2301_0401_3: Of course not. I have other Pokémon I can rely on.
charaepi_ch0206_00_lajournee/2301_0302_3:
Don’t you need other Pokémon for a
Triple Battle?
charaepi_ch0206_00_lajournee/2301_0402_3:
Of course! You can’t have a Triple Battle with just
one Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0206_00_lajournee/2301_1201_3:
Dana battles together with Regirock and
Registeel, too!
charaepi_ch0206_00_lajournee/2301_1201_4:
D-Dana has a lot of other Pokémon she’s
friendly with.

You need a lot of Pokémon for Triple Battles, so
she has a lot more than us.
Phew... Now that my head is cool again...

Let us show you the Battle Chatelaine–style
triple-team combination!
